html: Red flag laws with due process both respect the Second Amendment and help us keep weapons out of the hands of those intending to commit violent acts.
text: Red flag laws with due process both respect the Second Amendment and help us keep weapons out of the hands of those intending to commit violent acts.

html: In shooting after shooting, these dangerous and evil people have made their intention for violence clear beforehand. We should take their threats seriously and remove their weapons before they can commit their heinous acts.
text: In shooting after shooting, these dangerous and evil people have made their intention for violence clear beforehand. We should take their threats seriously and remove their weapons before they can commit their heinous acts.

html: While the Washington, D.C. gun control crowd wants to take guns from law-abiding citizens and criminals alike, smart red flag laws would allow law enforcement to take all guns away from those who are a threat to themselves or others.
text: While the Washington, D.C. gun control crowd wants to take guns from law-abiding citizens and criminals alike, smart red flag laws would allow law enforcement to take all guns away from those who are a threat to themselves or others.
